segment.source: How to install the Internet Explorer 11 update using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) and your Windows images.
segment.target: How to install the Internet Explorer 11 update using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) and your Windows images.

segment.source: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) and your Windows images (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) and your Windows images (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) and your Windows images
segment.target: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) and your Windows images

segment.source: You can install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) and your Windows images.
segment.target: You can install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) and your Windows images.

segment.source: You'll need to extract the .cab file for each supported operating system and platform combination and the .msu file for each prerequisite update.
segment.target: You'll need to extract the .cab file for each supported operating system and platform combination and the .msu file for each prerequisite update.

segment.source: Download the IE11 update and prerequisites here:
segment.target: Download the IE11 update and prerequisites here:

segment.source: Microsoft Download Center
segment.target: Microsoft Download Center

segment.source: Microsoft Update Catalog
segment.target: Microsoft Update Catalog

segment.source: After you install the .msu file updates, you'll need to add them to your MDT deployment.
segment.target: After you install the .msu file updates, you'll need to add them to your MDT deployment.

segment.source: You'll also need to extract the IE11 .cab update file from the IE11 installation package, using the command-line option.
segment.target: You'll also need to extract the IE11 .cab update file from the IE11 installation package, using the command-line option.

segment.source: For example, .
segment.target: For example, .

segment.source: Installing IE11 using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT)
segment.target: Installing IE11 using Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT)

segment.source: MDT adds IE11 to your Windows images, regardless whether you are creating or deploying a customized or non-customized image.
segment.target: MDT adds IE11 to your Windows images, regardless whether you are creating or deploying a customized or non-customized image.

segment.source: MDT also lets you perform offline servicing during the System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager task sequence, letting you add IE11 before starting Windows.
segment.target: MDT also lets you perform offline servicing during the System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager task sequence, letting you add IE11 before starting Windows.

segment.source: For info, see Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT).
segment.target: For info, see Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT).

segment.source: To add IE11 to a MDT deployment share
segment.target: To add IE11 to a MDT deployment share

segment.source: Right-click Packages from each Deployment Shares location, and then click Import OS Packages.
segment.target: Right-click Packages from each Deployment Shares location, and then click Import OS Packages.

segment.source: Go to the Specify Directory page, search for your folder with your update files (.cab and .msu) for import, and click Next.
segment.target: Go to the Specify Directory page, search for your folder with your update files (.cab and .msu) for import, and click Next.

segment.source: Go to the Summary page and click Next.
segment.target: Go to the Summary page and click Next.

segment.source: MDT starts importing your update files.
segment.target: MDT starts importing your update files.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Ignore any warnings that say, "Skipping invalid CAB file".
segment.target: Ignore any warnings that say, "Skipping invalid CAB file".

segment.source: This shows up because the Import OS Packages wizard skips the IE11Support.cab file, which isn't an actual update file.
segment.target: This shows up because the Import OS Packages wizard skips the IE11Support.cab file, which isn't an actual update file.

segment.source: After the import finishes, click Finish.
segment.target: After the import finishes, click Finish.

segment.source: Offline servicing with MDT
segment.target: Offline servicing with MDT

segment.source: You can add the IE11 update while you're performing offline servicing, or slipstreaming, of your Windows images.
segment.target: You can add the IE11 update while you're performing offline servicing, or slipstreaming, of your Windows images.

segment.source: This method lets you deploy IE11 without needing any additional installation after you've deployed Windows.
segment.target: This method lets you deploy IE11 without needing any additional installation after you've deployed Windows.

segment.source: These articles have step-by-step details about adding packages to your Windows images:
segment.target: These articles have step-by-step details about adding packages to your Windows images:

segment.source: For Windows 8.1, see Add or Remove Packages Offline Using DISM.
segment.target: For Windows 8.1, see Add or Remove Packages Offline Using DISM.

segment.source: For Windows 7 SP1, see Add or Remove Packages Offline.
segment.target: For Windows 7 SP1, see Add or Remove Packages Offline.
